website_content.content:
Categories FactCheck ReportsRishi SunakUnited Kingdom
]
Screenshot of the tweet.
The Claim and Our Verdict
**The claim**: A video claims to show Britain’s new Prime Minister Rishi Sunak dancing at a party.
**Fact-checking:**
1.  There is no evidence that the man in the viral video is Rishi Sunak. The video was published in July 2019 on Instagram by Wayne Lineker. It actually shows people dancing at a club in Ibiza, Spain. In recent years, Lineker has repeatedly posted the same video on social media to express his stance and attitude towards different social events.
2.  Several media outlets and fact-checking organizations have debunked similar claims, clarifying that the man in the video is not Rishi Sunak but his lookalike. The French news channel France 24 has pointed out that Sunak has a mole on the left side of his face, but the man in the video does not.
3.  According to Sunak’s official social media accounts, in July 2019, he stayed in the U.K. and attended various events in the country. Therefore, he did not go to Ibiza in Spain, nor he appeared in the viral video.
**Our verdict**: The man dancing in the viral video is not Britain’s new Prime Minister Rishi Sunak.
News Brief
A  of a man dancing was shared Oct. 26, 2022, on Twitter, with the caption “Britain’s new Prime Minister.” It claims that the man dancing in the video is Rishi Sunak, U.K.’s new Prime Minister.
According to...[Content truncated]

Relevance.Relevance Justification: This evidence effectively debunks claims that the video shows Rishi Sunak by detailing how the video was published earlier and pointing out that the dancing individual is a lookalike. It provides factual verification and supports the claim of mistaken identity.

Rishi Sunak lookalike cut shapes at Wayne Lineker's club in Ibiza. Rishi Sunak lookalike dancing at a beach club in Ibiza | **Youtube: 3W Daily**
Palma27/10/2022 14:37
Minutes after **Rishi Sunak** was confirmed as the new British prime minister, **a video showing a young man partying at a famous beach club in Sant Antoni, Ibiza, was picked up by several media outlets and has gone viral.**
>  Our new Prime Minister Rishi Sunak 😂 @britishmemes      
Months ago, the video was widely circulated and now it has been circulated again, with several media outlets suggesting that it was Sunak, 42, the youngest prime minister in the modern era.
##### Related news
]
#### 
**The resemblance is unmistakable but it is a ‘double’ of Sunak**. It is a young man who bears a striking resemblance to him.
The images accompanying this story were filmed at the **island’s Ocean Beach Club** and were initially posted on the TikTok profile of club owner **Wayne Lineker** with the caption “Rishi Sunak trying to win over an Ibiza crowd today and getting votes for his campaign”.

======================================================================================
### India,  27 Oct 2022 10:03 AM
###  |

A journalist at heart loves the in-depth work of reporting, writing, editing, research, and data analysis. A digital and social media enthusiast.
The viral vial video dates back to July 2019 and the man in the video is not Rishi Sunak but his lookalike. The viral video has nothing to do with the newly appointed British PM Rishi Sunak.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(javascript:void\(0\))
(javascript:void\(0\))
(javascript:void\(0\);)
Rishi Sunak became the Prime Minister of Britain after the dramatic exit of Boris Johnson and Liz Truss from the prime ministerial position of Britain. After his appointment, many videos and pictures of Rishi Sunak are being shared on social media with misleading claims. One such video is going viral on social media. In the viral video, a man can be seen dancing and partying on the beach. While sharing this video, people on social media claimed that the man in the viral video is Rishi Sunak.
A Twitter user shared this video and wrote a caption which reads, "UK new PM@RishiSunak in an old video dancing to the tunes, it seems UK fate is in safe hands now."
> UK new PM  in an old video dancing to the tunes, it seems UK fate is in safe hands now 😀
> 
> — Manoj (@Nixachar) 
Another user wrote, "Kattar Hindu PM Rishi Sunak."
> In case anyone were curious about what chaddi the new British PM wears… 
> 
> — Amit Schandillia (@Schandillia) 
It is being widely shared on  and  with a similar claim.
Claim:
------
Viral video shows Rishi Sunak dancing on a beach.
Fact Check:
-----------
The Logical Indian fact-check team verified the viral claim and found it to be false. The man in the viral video is...[Content truncated]

Relevance.Relevance Justification: The evidence states with clarity that the individual in the viral video is not Rishi Sunak but his lookalike. It also mentions that the video dates back to July 2019, which provides a historical basis for the claims.

metatags.og:description: 30.4K likes, 1255 comments. “Rishi Sunak and Keir Starmer clashed over trans rights during the BBC’s Prime Ministerial Debate on 26th June.  Answering a question from a viewer on women’s-only spaces, the two political leaders debated on the Equality Act.  Sunak said he wanted to “chang[e] the law so that the old Equalities Act recognises that sex means biological sex.”  “That will allow us to […] protect female-only spaces, female-only services. It's crystal clear for you. There is a choice on that question at this election, because Keir Starmer has not matched my pledge to reform the Equalities Act to pass new law,” the Conservative leader added. “It's very important that we protect women's spaces,” said Labour leader Keir Starmer. “But what I will also say is that I do recognise that there are a small number of people who are born into a gender that they don't identify with, and I will treat them as I treat all human beings, with dignity and respect,” he continued.”

website_content.content:
!
Published 16:03 24 Jan 2022 GMT
The video was posted by Wayne Lineker after it emerged that clubs in Ibiza will be allowed to open in April
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
People have picked up on a  lookalike throwing some shapes at Wayne Lineker's  club. Here he is in all his glory:
The video shows the man dubbed 'Raving Rishi' wearing some black Versace shorts and sporting a pair of sunglasses with a signature Ocean Beach orange cup in his hand.
Very aware the camera is on him, he's pulled out his gun fingers as people made space for him and (what looks like) his pal on the dance floor.
The video was posted by Wayne in response to news that clubs in Ibiza will be able to open in April.
Wayne, 59, wrote on Instagram: "This is crazy right now. It’s literally going mad. People booking Ibiza flights, already getting full after today’s announcements."
!
Instagram/@waynelineker
He went on: "I’m nervous what’s gonna happen on the morning of the 31st jan when bed bookings open and events are announced for @obeachibizaI I told you 'this will be the summer of our lives'."
He then added the hashtags 'no restrictions', 'no masks', 'just party' and 'back to life' at the end of his post.
Commenting on the 12 second clip, one person wrote: "...[Content truncated]

website_quality_evaluation.justification: LadBible is known for entertainment and light news but has gained some credibility for covering trending topics. However, its sensational style means that it isn't always reliable for serious topics, particularly those involving accurate reporting on public figures and events.

Relevance.Relevance Justification: The evidence provides information about the video being posted by Wayne Lineker, suggesting it shows a lookalike of Rishi Sunak. While it gives context, it lacks concrete verification details.

article.headline: Rishi Sunak At Beach Party? No, Viral Video Features UK PM’s Doppelganger

ClaimReview.claimReviewed: Rishi Sunak seen dancing at a beach party.

website_content.content:
[Content truncated]...al Video Features UK PM’s Doppelganger
=========================================================================
Written By 
October 27, 2022
7192
]
### Authors
(blob:https://newschecker.in/3d7e3536fb2191eecfa4af1023c9b129)]
##### 
Vasudha noticed the growing problem of mis/disinformation online after studying New Media at ACJ in Chennai and became interested in separating facts from fiction. She is interested in learning how global issues affect individuals on a micro level. Before joining Newschecker’s English team, she was working with Latestly.
_(The article was originally published in  by Saurabh Pandey)_
Claim
-----
The newly appointed Prime Minister of the UK, ****, is seen dancing at a beach party.
](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns=)
Screenshot of Facebook post by @ashley.millsdale
Fact
----
We conducted Google reverse image searches on the keyframes of the viral video which led us to a report by , dated January 24, 2022, titled ‘Raving Rishi living his best life when Boris gets fired’: Video of **Chancellor’s doppelgänger** throwing shapes in Wayne Lineker’s Ibiza club sets social media on fire’
Displaying visuals from the viral video, the report elaborated, “A video of a **Rishi Sunak doppelgänger** dancing at Wayne Lineker’s Ibiza club has set social media alight. The footage shows a man, who has since been dubbed ‘Raving Rishi’, cutting shapes at a sunny party  surrounded by hundreds of party-goers.”
(blob:https://newschecker.in/6924d057e0400429f0cc70a1e266db91)](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns=)
Screengrab from Daily Mail website
It added, “It is unclear when the video was taken or the identity of **Mr Sunak’s lookalike**, but the footage appears to have been taken at Mr Lineker’s O Beach Ibiza club on the Spanish party island.”
The video clip was reportedly posted on Wayne Lineker’s Instagram page – the owner of the beach club in Ibiza.
A report by , dated January 24, 2022, corroborated with the details of the Daily Mail article, while calling the man “a very convincing doppelganger” of Sunak.
Another report by ****, dated January 24, 2022, also identified the man seen partying in the viral footage as Rishi Sunak’s look alike...[Content truncated]

website_quality_evaluation.justification: NewsChecker is dedicated to fact-checking in the Indian context and aims to provide clarity on misinformation. It employs blockchain technology for verification and maintains a good reputation for being thorough, which supports a higher quality score.

Relevance.Relevance Justification: This evidence supports the assertion that the video features a lookalike and discusses how the video and claims have circulated, reinforcing that it does not show Rishi Sunak himself.

[Content truncated]...' at Ibiza club? Viral video sets Internet on fire; has over 3.6 million views
====================================================================================================================
]
##### 
03:11 PM Nov 04, 2022 IST
*   ]
*   ]
*   ]
*   ](whatsapp://send?text=https://www.tribuneindia.com/news/diaspora/is-this-rishi-sunak-dancing-shirtless-at-ibiza-club-viral-video-sets-internet-on-fire-has-over-3-6-million-views-447534/IsthisRishiSunakdancing'shirtless'atIbizaclub?ViralvideosetsInternetonfire;hasover3.6millionviews)
  Follow us] Connect with us]

  !]
Advertisement
**Chandigarh, November 4**
An old video showing a Rishi Sunak lookalike dancing at a club has resurfaced on social media. It went viral in no time as soon as the 42-year-old was named the prime minister of the United Kingdom.
The video has been circulated with claims that it features Sunak, but here is a fact check.
A quick Google search says he is not Rishi Sunak. The man dancing has a striking resemblance to Rishi Sunak. In the video, he is seen holding a drink in his hand and is seen dancing at a club in Ibiza with other partygoers.
> 
> 
> — No Context Brits (@NoContextBrits) 
On Twitter, the video has garnered over 3.6 million views. The clip had earlier gone viral in January.
The video was shot at Wayne Lineker’s O Beach Ibiza club.
Wayne Lineker’s Instagram profile also reveals that the video was first uploaded in July 2019. Lineker is the owner of the O Beach Ibiza Club on the Spanish island.
> View this post on Instagram
> 
> 
Moreover, fact-checking website Boom Live did a further investigation of Sunak’s social media profiles and found no evidence that he had been in Ibiza in July 2019. Instead, the British leader had attended an event with North Yorkshire students on July 10 and a community event at July 15, 2019.
Rishi Sunak is the first Hindu Prime Minister of Indian origin in the UK.
